analysis.key_quote: It is absolutely paramount to a functioning democracy that the civil servants who bear the responsibility of carrying out government functions everyday do so without threat of political retribution.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about politicization of civil service, due process rights, and the integrity of the merit-based system. The author emphasizes the importance of protecting civil servants from political manipulation, which aligns with a stance against the rule.
